name: opinionated
description: The purpose of this addon is to inform you when a link location is an opinion article. Most popular news sites have opinion blogs, and you don't want to confuse those articles with reporting articles. The addon will add "[Opinionated]" to the text content of every identified URL that links to an opinion article.

scripts.build: npm run clean:full && npm run ts && npm run bundle && web-ext build -i *js {package-lock,package,tsconfig,tslint}.json content_scripts/data content_scripts/*.ts content_scripts/opinionated.js && npm run clean
scripts.bundle: browserify content_scripts/opinionated.js -o content_scripts/opinionated.js && uglifyjs -o content_scripts/opinionated.min.js --compress --mangle -- content_scripts/opinionated.js
scripts.test: npm run clean:full && npm run ts && npm run bundle && web-ext run -i *js {package-lock,package,tsconfig,tslint}.json content_scripts/data content_scripts/*.ts content_scripts/opinionated.js && npm run clean:full
